name: Keyboard Warrior - A Speedrunning Game
description:
A speedrunning game where you type the letters/numbers as fast as you can to achieve the best time. 12 levels with split times to track your speeds. Saved fastest times. 

Hard mode where if you press one wrong key the run is over.

A big thank you to the unity and speedrunning community, this game is a free little project as thanks to everyone who has helped through the years.

-Raithen
